seo.title: Vernazza Sights 2025 | Must-See Attractions in Cinque Terre
seo.description: Explore the top sights in Vernazza. Doria Castle, Santa Margherita Church, the iconic harbor, and best viewpoints in this medieval village.

body.title: Top Sights & Attractions
body.subtitle: Discover Vernazza's iconic landmarks. From the medieval Doria Castle to the picturesque harbor, every corner offers breathtaking beauty.

features.title: Doria Castle & Tower
features.description: Climb the 11th-century tower for panoramic 360-degree views.

features.title: Santa Margherita Church
features.description: Gothic church from 1318 with octagonal bell tower on the waterfront.

features.title: The Harbor
features.description: Natural port and main square - Cinque Terre's most iconic view.

features.title: Belforte Viewpoint
features.description: Medieval watchtower with dramatic views over the village.

features.title: Colorful Houses
features.description: Pastel buildings stacked vertically up the hillside.

features.title: Main Piazza
features.description: Heart of village life with cafes overlooking the sea.
